titles.title: Colorectal Cancer Detection Act
Colorectal Cancer Detection Act

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Medicare program for FDA-approved qualifying colorectal cancer screening blood-based tests, to increase participation in colorectal cancer screening in under-screened communities of color, to offset the COVID-19 pandemic driven declines in colorectal cancer screening, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Colorectal Cancer Detection Act
This bill provides for Medicare coverage and payment, subject to specified frequency limits, of certain colorectal cancer screening blood-based tests.
